responses: You can call me UM Shuttle Bus Chatbot.
I'm UM Shuttle Bus Chatbot.!
Just call me UM Shuttle Bus Chatbot.!
I'm UM Shuttle Bus Chatbot. Nice to meet you!

patterns: How often does the bus come?
What is the frequency of the bus?
Can you tell me how often the bus comes?
Bus frequency
Bus interval
responses: This depends on different routes of the bus. You can check the schedule for more details. For bus A, it comes every 15 minutes. For bus B, it comes every 20 minutes.

patterns: How often does bus A come?
What is the frequency of bus A?
Can you tell me how often bus A comes?
Bus A frequency
Bus A interval
What is the first bus time for bus A?
What is the last bus time for bus A?
When is the first bus for bus A?
When is the last bus for bus A?
Operating hours for bus A
Bus A operating hours
What time does bus A start?
What time does bus A end?
responses: Bus A comes every 15 minutes. The first bus is at 7:00 AM and the last bus is at 10:00 PM.

patterns: What days does the bus operate?
Can you tell me the operating days of the bus?
Bus operating days
Bus days
Bus operation days
Does the bus operate on weekends?
Does the bus operate on weekdays?
Does the bus operate on public holidays?
Does the bus operate on Mondays, Tuesdays, Wednesdays, Thursdays, Fridays, Saturdays, Sundays?
What days does the bus not operate?
Bus non-operating days
Bus off days
responses: The bus operates every day except for weekends and public holidays.
The bus operates from Monday to Friday and does not operate on weekends and public holidays.

patterns: Are there any restrictions on food or drinks while riding the shuttle buses?
Can I eat or drink on the bus?
Can I bring food or drink on the bus?
Food and drink on the bus
Can I eat on the bus
Can I drink on the bus
responses: Food and drinks are not allowed on the bus. Please consume them before boarding the bus.

intents.tag: eligibility for riding the shuttle buses
patterns: Who can use the shuttle buses?
Can anyone use the shuttle buses?
Who is allowed to ride the shuttle buses?
Eligibility for riding the shuttle buses
Who can ride the shuttle buses
Who can take the shuttle buses
Can non-university people use the shuttle bus service?
Can UM foundation students use the shuttle bus service?
Can UM staff use the shuttle bus service?
Can UM lecturers use the shuttle bus service?
Can UM employees use the shuttle bus service?
Can UM alumni use the shuttle bus service?
Can UM visitors use the shuttle bus service?
Can UM guests use the shuttle bus service?
responses: The shuttle bus service is available for all students (including PASUM students), staff, lecturers, employees of the University of Malaya. Non-university people are not allowed to use the shuttle bus service.

Students of the University of Malaya (including PASUM students), staff, lecturers, and employees are allowed to use the shuttle bus service. Non-university people are not allowed to use the shuttle bus service.
